references.paper_title: Stable Video Diffusion: Scaling Latent Video Diffusion Models to Large Datasets
references.reason: This paper introduces Stable Video Diffusion (SVD), the base model upon which MobileVD is built, serving as the foundation for optimizations and improvements in MobileVD.

references.paper_title: Align your latents: High-resolution video synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This work also contributes to the foundational understanding of video diffusion models, which directly influences the design and optimization strategies employed in MobileVD.

references.paper_title: SF-V: Single Forward Video Generation Model
references.reason: The SF-V model's single-step adversarial finetuning technique is adopted by MobileVD to drastically accelerate video generation, making the approach highly efficient.

references.paper_title: Estimating or propagating gradients through stochastic neurons for conditional computation
references.reason: This paper describes straight-through estimators (STE) which MobileVD uses to handle the non-differentiability of its sampling strategy for temporal block pruning.

references.paper_title: The approximation of one matrix by another of lower rank
references.reason: This paper's theorem on low-rank matrix approximation is used to initialize the funnel matrices in the channel funneling technique of MobileVD, improving model performance.
